content: **knitted jumper in drops flora and drops kid-silk the piece is worked top down in stocking stitch with raglan and short sleeves sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fl-085 yarn group a + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops flora from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-200-200-200-250-250 g colour 25 caramel and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 75-100-100-100-125-125 g colour 42 almond **needles** drops circular needles size 4 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needles size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 18 stitches in width and 23 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality= 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
